item.title: Convert Microsoft Pex path conditions from Z3 native format to SMT-LIB
item.description: We talked before about getting the code path conditions from Microsoft Pex as in Z3 native format(.z3 file). Sometimes you may need to convert from Z3 native format to SMT-LIB standard. You can do that using the Z3 C# APIs. The only trick here is: you have to use the Microsoft.Z3.dll that come with your current Microsoft Pex installation (C:\Program Files\Microsoft Pex\bin\Microsoft.Z3.dll). To show how it works, letâ€™s create a new C# console application.
